biotools.summary: CaverDock provides a fast and easy way to set up and run ligand binding and unbinding calculations through protein tunnels and channels. The pyCaverDock is a Python3 API designed to improve user experience with the tool and further facilitate the ligand transport analyses. The API enables users to simplify the steps needed to use CaverDock, from automatizing setup processes to designing screening pipelines.
